ygData.subject: Re: Remember Him..........
ygData.msgSnippet: All ye Maximals that are training (mine and Alloran s, I believe), we should have some more fun as more chars start joining. I m going to bug Megan to take IR

All ye Maximals that are training (mine and Alloran's, I believe), we 
should have some more fun as more chars start joining. I'm going to 
bug Megan to take IR back, I'm having trouble remembering to post 
with her.

Dcoburn, the CF no longer exists. Its been taken apart/destroyed and 
built onto the Element to make Maximal City.

::IR::

IR recieves the transmission, tapping her comm link to 
reply. "Welcome back. I'll be right out to meet you."

Exiting from the room, she looks back at the other Maximals. "Some 
more Maximals have arrived. I'll show them in and then we'll train on 
something more interesting."

She walks out of the room and makes her way out of Maximal City, 
looking around and seeing Hell Drak and Necromancer. "Hello. We're 
training right now, you're welcome to join in if you want."




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "LurkerAbyss" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> OOC: Ok.  Well, as long as everybody is okay with me taking my 
chars back, then my little "meanwhile..." story should be okay.
> 
> IC:  Hell Drak and Necromancer entered the CF, after Quatro went 
in.  Necromancer wondered if Iron Raptor was still the leader, and 
what changes had gone by.  It seemed like much time had passed, but 
if he knew how much time had really passed, he wouldn't be in so much 
wonder.  He decided to send a message to Iron Raptor through his comm-
link.
> 
>       "Iron Raptor, this is Necromancer, I've returned, and Hell 
Drak is with me," Necromancer said.
